get.summary: Checks whether there is already a client with the same values in the database.

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: First name of the client or company name in the case of a company

parameters.name: firstNamePartner
parameters.description: First name of the client's partner

parameters.name: lastNamePartner
parameters.description: Last name of the client's partner

parameters.name: dateOfBirthPartner
parameters.description: Date of birth of the client's partner

parameters.name: dateOfBirth
parameters.description: Date of birth of the client

403.description: No query parameter provided (at least one is required)

404.description: Error during checking for duplicates in the backend

post.summary: Reserves a new client identification in Finnova without opening a client. The client ID obtained needs to be used again during the client opening.

404.description: Error when retrieving new client identification

get.summary: Delivers the AMLO information for a particular client.

404.description: Error when retrieving AMLO information for a client

put.summary: Adds a new client to Finnova.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Here, either the technical client ID obtained from POST call from resource '/api/v6/banks/{number}/clients', or a UUID generated on the client side can be used

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Client data that must be added to Finnova

400.description: Error when adding a new client in the back-end application

post.summary: Reserves a new account number in Finnova without opening an account.

404.description: Error when retrieving new account number

put.summary: Adds a new card for a new client.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Personal, account and card data regarding the identified client in the resource.

400.description: Error when entering or allocating a new card.

412.description: Power of attorney for account missing or no more valid.

put.summary: Adds a new account to a new client.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: Here, either the technical account ID obtained from POST call from resource '/banks/{number}/clients/{id}/accounts', or a UUID generated on the client side can be used.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Personal data and account data regarding the identified client in the resource

400.description: Error when opening a new account

put.summary: Adds a new CDB entry for an existing client.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Technical client ID (KD_LNR) of the client for which the CDB entry should be made.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: A UUID generated on the client side that unambiguously identifies the CDB resource

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: CDB data which needs to be entered under the selected client.

400.description: Error creating the CDB entry

put.summary: Adds a new contract for a new client.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: A UUID generated on the client side that unambiguously identifies the contract resource

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Personal, account and contract data regarding the identified client in the resource

400.description: Error when entering or allocating a new account.

put.summary: Adds a new client note for an existing client.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: A UUID generated on the client side that unambiguously identifies the note resource

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Note data that needs to be entered for the selected client.

400.description: Error when creating the note

put.summary: Adds a new pending client task for an existing client.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: A UUID generated on the client side that unambiguously identifies the pending task resource

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Pending task data that needs to be entered for the selected client.

400.description: Request is not valid

put.summary: Adds a new power of attorney agreement for a new client.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: A UUID generated on the client side that unambiguously identifies the power of attorney resource.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Personal, account and contract data regarding the identified client in the resource

400.description: Error when creating new power of attorney

put.summary: Adds a new client relationship to an existing client. The client identified according to the client identification in the path is the person for which the new relationship is created. The type of relationship is defined using the client relationship code (e.g. contact person). A request with the same two technical client numbers (ID and relationshipClientID) and the same relationship number (number) is interpreted as the same message and executed only once.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: A UUID generated on the client side that unambiguously identifies the relationship resource

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Personal data regarding the identified client in the resource

400.description: Error when adding new relation

get.summary: Returns the risk category based on the delivered input attributes.

parameters.name: pepSystem
parameters.description: Automatically generated code for politically exposed persons

parameters.name: clientMainType
parameters.description: Client main type code according to KD_STAMM.KD_HTYP_CD

parameters.name: pepManual
parameters.description: Manually generated code for politically exposed persons

parameters.name: countryOfDomicile
parameters.description: ISO_3166-1 - Country code of the country of domicile

parameters.name: financialIntermediary
parameters.description: Yes / No code showing whether or not the client is a financial intermediary

parameters.name: nationality
parameters.description: ISO_3166-1 - Country code of the leading client's nationality

parameters.name: furtherRisks
parameters.description: Code showing whether there are further risk criteria

parameters.name: pepManual2ndPerson
parameters.description: Manually generated code for another politically exposed person with a relationship to the client

parameters.name: nationality2ndPerson
parameters.description: ISO_3166-1 - Country code of the referenced client's nationality

parameters.name: countryOfDomicileControllingCompany
parameters.description: Code of the controlling company's country of domicile. This is loaded if the client is controlled by a foreign company

parameters.name: domiciliaryCompany
parameters.description: Code for a domiciliary company (company that does not do business in the country of domicile)

parameters.name: cdbIdentification
parameters.description: CDB check type code of the client

parameters.name: legalStatus
parameters.description: Code of the company's legal status

parameters.name: noga
parameters.description: Sector / NOGA code ((Nomenclature Generale des Activites economiques: General Classification of Economic Activities) according to version 2008)

400.description: Error determining the AMLO risk category

post.summary: Reserves a new client key (technical sequence number) with corresponding reserved client number in Finnova without opening a client. The client key/number obtained will be used for the actual client opening.

404.description: Error when retrieving new client identification

post.summary: Adds a new client to Finnova.

parameters.name: Request-ID
parameters.description: Client generated uuid used to enforce idempotence

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Client data that must be added to Finnova

200.description: Client entry was already successfully created (duplicate request)

400.description: Error when adding a new client

put.summary: Adds a new client to Finnova.

parameters.name: Request-ID
parameters.description: Client generated uuid used to enforce idempotence

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The technical client sequence number obtained from POST call to resource '/api/v7/banks/{number}/clientIdentifications'

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Client data that must be added to Finnova

200.description: Client entry was already successfully created (duplicate request)

400.description: Error when adding a new client

post.summary: Reserves a new account number in Finnova without opening an account.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Technical client sequence number of the client

404.description: Error when retrieving new account number

post.summary: Adds a new account for a client.

parameters.name: Request-ID
parameters.description: Client generated uuid used to enforce idempotence

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Personal data and account data regarding the identified client in the resource

400.description: Error when opening a new account

put.summary: Adds a new account with prior account key/number reservation to a client.

parameters.name: Request-ID
parameters.description: Client generated uuid used to enforce idempotence

parameters.name: accountKey
parameters.description: Technical account sequence number which has been obtained through a POST call of the resource '/banks/{number}/clients/{key}/accountIdentifications'.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Personal data and account data regarding the identified client in the resource

400.description: Error when opening a new account

post.summary: Adds a new card for a new client.

parameters.name: Request-ID
parameters.description: Client generated uuid used to enforce idempotence

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Technical client sequence number of the client

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Personal, account and card data regarding the identified client in the resource.

400.description: Error when opening a new card

404.description: Error when retrieving AMLO information for a client

parameters.name: Request-ID

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Technical client sequence number of the client for which the CDB entry should be made.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: CDB data which needs to be entered for the selected client.

post.summary: Adds a new contract for a new client.

parameters.name: key

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Personal, account and contract data regarding the identified client in the resource

200.description: Contract successfully created and allocated (duplicate request)

post.summary: Adds a new client note for an existing client.

parameters.name: Request-ID
parameters.description: Client generated uuid used to enforce idempotence

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Note data that needs to be entered for the selected client.

post.summary: Adds a new pending client task for an existing client.

parameters.description: Client generated uuid used to enforce idempotence

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Pending task data that needs to be entered for the selected client.

400.description: Error when creating a new pending task

post.summary: Adds a new power of attorney agreement for a new client.

parameters.description: Client generated uuid used to enforce idempotence

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Personal, account and contract data regarding the identified client in the resource

200.description: Power of attorney successfully created (duplicate request)

400.description: Error when creating a new client relationship

post.summary: Adds a new client relationship to an existing client. The client identified according to the client identification in the path is the person for which the new relationship is created. The type of relationship is defined using the client relationship code (e.g. contact person). A request with the same two technical client numbers (ID and relationshipClientID) and the same relationship number (number) is interpreted as the same message and executed only once.

get.summary: Checks whether there is already a client with the same values in the database.

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: Last name of the client or company name in the case of a company

parameters.name: dateOfBirth
parameters.description: Date of birth (yyyy-MM-dd) of the client

parameters.name: firstNamePartner
parameters.description: First name of the client's partner

parameters.name: lastNamePartner
parameters.description: Last name of the client's partner

parameters.name: dateOfBirthPartner
parameters.description: Date of birth (yyyy-MM-dd) of the client's partner

403.description: No query parameter provided (at least one is required)

404.description: Error during checking for duplicates in the backend

get.summary: Returns the risk category based on the delivered input attributes.

parameters.name: pepSystem
parameters.description: Automatically generated code for politically exposed persons

parameters.name: pepManual
parameters.description: Manually generated code for politically exposed persons

parameters.name: countryOfDomicile
parameters.description: ISO_3166-1 - Country code of the country of domicile (for corporate clients)

parameters.name: financialIntermediary
parameters.description: Is the client a financial intermediary?

parameters.name: nationality
parameters.description: ISO_3166-1 - Country code of the leading client's nationality (for private individual and two-person household)

parameters.name: pepManual2ndPerson
parameters.description: Manually generated code for another politically exposed person with a relationship to the client

parameters.name: nationality2ndPerson
parameters.description: ISO_3166-1 - Country code of the referenced client's nationality

parameters.name: countryOfDomicileControllingCompany
parameters.description: Code of the controlling company's country of domicile. This is loaded if the client is controlled by a foreign company

parameters.name: domiciliaryCompany
parameters.description: Is it a domiciliary company? (company that does not do business in the country of domicile)

parameters.name: cdbIdentification
parameters.description: CDB check type code of the client

parameters.name: legalStatus
parameters.description: Code of the legal status of a company

parameters.name: noga
parameters.description: Sector / NOGA code ((Nomenclature Generale des Activites economiques: General Classification of Economic Activities) according to version 2008)

400.description: Error determining the AMLO risk category

clientStatus.description: Client status code. This status helps to distinguish inactive clients from active clients

firstName.description: First name of the leading person

lastName.description: Last name of leading person or company name

place.description: Designation of the place (excl. country and postcode)

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the individual client or foundation date of a legal entity

clientIdentified.description: Code for whether a CDB check has been carried out (true) or not (false)

possibleDuplicates.description: Provides all information about a possible duplicate.

externalNumber.description: External representation of the client number

pepSystem.description: Automatically generated code for politically exposed persons

pepManual.description: Manually generated code for politically exposed persons

furtherRisks.description: Code showing whether there are further risk criteria

riskCategory.description: Risk category code / Result of the money laundering check

decisionAdvisor.description: Advisor's AMLO decision as to whether the relationship is accepted or not

advisor.description: User ID of the employee who made the AMLO decision

amloDecisionResponse.description: Delivers the Anti Money Laundering Office (AMLO) information for a particular client.

id.description: Finnova user identification (USER_ID) of the advisor who should be assigned to this new client. The identification of the advisor is only valid together with their role. If only the advisor, without the role, is provided, the advisor is not taken into account and a default advisor, who is assigned to the client, is determined.

role.description: Role of the advisor assigned to this client (reference in table KD1KDKRK). Specification of the advisor's role is mandatory if the advisor is also provided via the interface. If the role alone, without the advisor, is provided, it is not taken into account.

pepSystem.description: Automatically generated code for politically exposed persons

pepManual.description: Manually generated code for politically exposed persons

furtherRisks.description: Code showing whether there are further risk criteria

riskIncreaseEmployee.description: User ID of the employee who performed the uprating

riskReductionEmployee.description: User ID of the employee who performed the downrating

decisionAdvisor.description: Advisor's AMLO decision as to whether the relationship is accepted or not

advisor.description: User ID of the employee who made the AMLO decision

type.description: Code of the address type. At least one address must be entered with KD_ADR_LNR = 11 = domicile address

recipientRef.description: Recipient reference in the address line, e.g. For the attention of Mr Meier

street.description: Street and house number are written together in KD_ADR.STRASSE

houseNumber.description: Street and house number are written together in KD_ADR.STRASSE

additionAddressLine.description: Additional line can be added before place for foreign addresses or PO boxes (PO box information needs to be directly before place

placeDes.description: Designation of the place (only to be used if attribute 'Place' is not filled)(without country and postcode)

place.description: Technical sequence number of the place (assigned by Swiss Post, can only be used in the case of addresses with country of domicile 'Switzerland')

postcode.description: Postcode (only to be used if attribute 'Place' is not filled)

country.description: ISO_3166-1 - country code of the destination country

careOf.description: Code if address is a c/o address. Not permitted for domicile address.

vatCountry.description: ISO_3166-1 - country code of the domicile address for the VAT calculation

validAfter.description: Date after which the address is valid, opening date minus one day

advertisingDesired.description: Code showing whether or not advertising is desired

formOfAddress.description: Form of address code of the individual client

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the individual client

nationality.description: ISO_3166-1 - country code of the partner's nationality

nationality2.description: ISO_3166-1 - country code of the second nationality if the partner has dual citizenship

title.description: Code of the partner's academic title

maritalStatus.description: Code of the partner's marital status

participantStatus.description: Acceptance ratio that defines the participant status

validFrom.description: The acceptance ratio is valid as of this date (exclusive)

validUntil.description: The acceptance ratio is valid until this date (inclusive)

externalNumber.description: External representation of the client number

formOfAddress.description: Form of address code for individual client

salutation.description: The individual salutation can be used to override the generated salutation (e.g. for company, system suggestion: 'Dear Client')

lastName.description: Last name of the leading person

firstName.description: First name of the leading person

nameAddition.description: Additional line for the name or the company designation

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the individual client or foundation date of a legal entity

yearOfBirth.description: Year of birth of the individual client or year of foundation of a company

maritalStatus.description: Code of the leading client's marital status

matrimonialPropertyRegime.description: Code of the leading client's matrimonial property regime

nationality2.description: ISO_3166-1 - country code of the second nationality in the case of dual citizenship

nationality.description: ISO_3166-1 - Country code of the leading client's nationality (for private individual and two-person household)

placeOfOrigin.description: Code of the place of origin of an individual client or company domicile of a company

countryOfDomicileControllingCompany.description: ISO_3166-1 - country code of the controlling company's country of domicile. This is loaded if the client is controlled by a foreign company.

countryOfDomicile.description: ISO_3166-1 - Country code of the country of domicile (for corporate clients)

legalStatus.description: Code of the company's legal status

legalForm.description: Code that describes the following information for natural persons: marital status, gender and matrimonial law. For companies, it describes the legal form

andRelationship.description: Flag indicating if two-person household is an 'and' relationship (true) or an 'or' relationship (false)

contactPerson.description: Free text entry of a contact person at the client company

financialIntermediary.description: Yes / No code showing whether or not the client is a financial intermediary

companyId.description: Swiss Business Identification Number, which replaces the old VAT number

entryCodeCommercialRegister.description: Code of the commercial register entry code

commercialRegisterEntryDate.description: Date of entry in the commercial register according to field HR_EINTR_CD

commercialRegisterEntryDeletionDate.description: Deletion date of entry in the commercial register

zekID.description: ZEK (Central Office for Credit Information) client ID

domiciliaryCompany.description: Code for a domiciliary company (company that does not do business in the country of domicile)

numberOfEmployeesAsAt.description: Number of employees as at date

numberOfEmployees.description: Number of employees of the company

noga.description: Economic activity / NOGA code ((Nomenclature Generale des Activites economiques: economic activity) according to version 2008

language.description: ISO_639-1 - language code of the leading person's first language

frequencyOfContact.description: Code of the frequence of client contact

bulkMailing.description: Code for whether bulk mailing is permitted or not

openingDate.description: Date of the client relationship opening

advisor.description: Advisors can be provided with their roles when opening clients here. Please note that both fields need to be specified so that the advisor is taken into account accordingly.

client.description: Client data that must be added to Finnova

value.description: E-mail address, telephone number, etc. (for telephone number, correct format must be used  FATCA indicium)

comment.description: Free text comment for the communication entry

id.description: Technical client identification number for client created

counterpartyCategory.description: Counterparty category code according to CAO

externalNumber.description: Reserved external representation of the account number

accountReservationResponse.description: Reserves a new account number in Finnova without opening an account.

authorisedPerson.description: Authorised person who can have use of the card (debit)

Card.description: Adds a new card for a new client.

id.description: Technical card number of the ordered card

number.description: Card number of the ordered card

externalNumber.description: Internal Finnova representation of the externally recognised account number

portfolioNumber.description: Portfolio (techn. no.) allocated to the account. If nothing is returned, the default portfolio '00' is used.

category.description: Account category for the designation of the account, which appears on statements

currency.description: ISO_4217 - Account currency code, or valuation currency in the case of a custody account

account.description: Personal data and account data regarding the identified client in the resource.

category.description: Category for the designation of the account if no free text is used

clientIdRelationship.description: This technical client ID refers to the client under which the relevant CDB check took place.

clientRole.description: Role of the client under the CDB client relationship

checkType.description: Check type code of the client

clientDocumentType.description: Code of the client document type

identificationNumber.description: ID number of the document selected under IDDOC_CD

idDateOfIssue.description: Date of issue of the identity document

idCountryOfIssue.description: ISO_3166-1 - country code of the ID country of issue

documentPlaceOfIssue.description: Place of issue of the ID

identityCheck.description: Radio button for checking whether or not the identity is ok

checker.description: User ID of the Finnova user / employee who performed the check

validFrom.description: Contract valid from date. Mandatory field with status Valid

printingDate.description: Printing time stamp of this contract

approvalDate.description: Date on which bank authorities acknowledged or approved contract

signatureDate.description: Date of the contract signature according to 'Place and date'

portfolioAllocated.description: Technical portfolio number which is required if the contract refers to this portfolio

accountAllocated.description: Technical account number which is required if the contract refers to this account

comment.description: Free text entry of comments for this contract

terminationRule.description: Rule code of the contract termination

storageLocation.description: Code of the document storage location

deliveryTypeEbanking.description: Accounts of a contract opened in the future receive electronic documents via internet banking by default, 4 = yes, otherwise no

docId.description: Technical document number of expected return documents or document numbers released for that

authorisationType.description: Authorisation type of allocated accounts which sets the defined control code values accordingly

autoActivation.description: Control code for whether newly opened accounts should be allocated automatically, Yes / No code

contractId.description: Bank-internal contract ID of the entered contract

contactOf.description: Date and time of the note creation when

contactType.description: Code of the client contact type

noteCode.description: Code of the client note code

employee.description: User ID of the employee who had contact with the client and who entered this note

initiative.description: Code for whether contact was made on the advisor's initiative (bank) or the client's initiative

comment.description: Comment on this note regarding this contact

note.description: Note data that needs to be entered for the selected client.

currency.description: ISO_4217 - Currency code for the note amount

id.description: Note ID of the created note

deadline.description: Deadline of pending task. May be compulsory depending on pending task type

createdOn.description: Entry date of the pending task

contactType.description: Code of the client contact type

completedOn.description: Date and time (dd.mm.yyyy hh:mm:ss) of completion

display.description: View code of the pending client task. Depending on the type of pending task, restriction may or may not be possible.

employee.description: User ID of the employee who is responsible for this pending task

orderNo.description: Original order this pending task refers to

comment.description: Comment regarding this pending client task. Depending on the type of pending task, loaded obligatorily or optionally.

pendingTask.description: Pending task data that needs to be entered for the selected client

currency.description: ISO_4217 - Currency code for the pending task amount

id.description: Pending task ID of the created pending task

validFrom.description: Contract 'valid from' date. Mandatory field with status 'Valid'

printingDate.description: Printing time stamp of this contract

approvalDate.description: Date on which bank authorities acknowledged or approved contract

signatureDate.description: Date of the contract signature according to 'Place and date'

portfolioAllocated.description: Technical portfolio number of the resource client which is required if the power of attorney concerns this portfolio

accountAllocated.description: Technical account number of the resource client which is required if the power of attorney refers to this account

comment.description: Free text entry of comments for this contract

terminationRule.description: Rule code of the contract termination

storageLocation.description: Code of the document storage location

status.description: Code of the Signbase power of attorney status

legitimation.description: Code of the legitimation for the power of attorney

signingAuthority.description: Code of the signing authority of the allocated client

contractId.description: Bank-internal contract ID of the entered contract

powerOfAttorneyResponseSuccess.description: Power of attorney agreement successfully created and allocated.

relationshipClientId.description: Technical client identification number of the client with a relationship to the client in the URI

since.description: Date since which this relationship exists

until.description: Date until which this relationship existed (Used for EU interest taxation)

ClientRelationshipRequest.description: Defines the relationship between the clients.

amloRiskCategory.description: Risk category code / Result of the money laundering check
Returns the risk category based on the delivered input attributes.

externalNumber.description: External representation of the client number

id.description: Finnova user identification (USER_ID) of the advisor who should be assigned to this new client. The identification of the advisor is only valid together with their role. If only the advisor, without the role, is provided, the advisor is not taken into account and a default advisor, who is assigned to the client, is determined.

role.description: Role of the advisor assigned to this client (reference in table KD1KDKRK). Specification of the advisor's role is mandatory if the advisor is also provided via the interface. If the role alone, without the advisor, is provided, it is not taken into account.

participantStatus.description: Acceptance ratio that defines the participant status

acceptanceRatio.description: Percentage rate at which a WIR participant wants to accept payments in WIR

validFrom.description: The acceptance ratio is valid as of this date (exclusive)

validUntil.description: The acceptance ratio is valid until this date (inclusive). 'MAX_DATE' is loaded in the case of unlimited validity.

pepSystem.description: Automatically generated code for politically exposed persons

pepManual.description: Manually generated code for politically exposed persons

pepCheckDate.description: PEP timestamp (yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss) of the last check

furtherRisks.description: Flag showing whether there are further risk criteria

riskIncreaseEmployee.description: User ID of the employee who performed the uprating

riskReductionEmployee.description: User ID of the employee who performed the downrating

decisionAdvisor.description: Advisor's AMLO decision as to whether the relationship is accepted or not

advisor.description: User ID of the employee who made the AMLO decision

type.description: Code of the address type. At least one address with KD_ADR_LNR = 11 = domicile address needs to be entered.

recipientRef.description: Recipient reference in the address line, e.g. For the attention of Mr Meier

street.description: Street and house number are written together in KD_ADR.STRASSE

houseNumber.description: Street and house number are written together in KD_ADR.STRASSE

additionAddressLine.description: Additional line directly before Place for foreign addresses or PO boxes (PO box information needs to be directly before Place)

placeDes.description: Designation of the place (only to be used if attribute 'Place' is not filled)(without country and postcode)

place.description: Technical sequence number of the place (assigned by Swiss Post, can only be used in the case of addresses with country of domicile 'Switzerland')

postcode.description: Postcode (only to be used if attribute 'Place' is not filled)

country.description: ISO_3166-1 - country code of the destination country

careOf.description: Flag whether address is a c/o address. Not permitted for domicile address.

vatCountry.description: ISO_3166-1 - country code of the domicile address, for the VAT calculation

validAfter.description: Date after which the address is valid, opening date minus one day

advertisingDesired.description: Flag whether or not advertising is desired

value.description: E-mail address, telephone number, etc. (for telephone number, correct format must be used  FATCA indicium)

comment.description: Free text comment for the communication entry

externalNumber.description: External representation of the client number

formOfAddress.description: Form of address code of the individual client

salutation.description: The individual salutation can be used to override the generated salutation (e.g. for company, system suggestion: 'Dear Client')

lastName.description: Last name of the leading person

firstName.description: First name of the leading person

nameBeforeMarriage.description: Name before marriage of the client

nameAddition.description: Additional line for the name or the company designation

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the individual client or foundation date of a legal entity

yearOfBirth.description: Year of birth of the individual client or year of foundation of a company

maritalStatus.description: Marital status of the leading client

matrimonialPropertyRegime.description: Matrimonial property regime of the leading client

nationality2.description: ISO_3166-1 - country code of second nationality in the case of dual national

nationality.description: ISO_3166-1 - Country code of the nationality of the leading client

placeOfOrigin.description: Technical sequence number of the place of origin of an individual client or company domicile of a company

countryOfDomicileControllingCompany.description: ISO_3166-1 - country code of the controlling company's country of domicile. This is loaded if the client is controlled by a foreign company.

countryOfDomicile.description: ISO_3166-1 - Country code of the country of domicile (for corporate clients)

legalForm.description: Code that describes the following information for natural persons: marital status, gender and matrimonial law. For companies, it describes the legal form

andRelationship.description: Flag indicating if two-person household is an 'and' relationship (true) or an 'or' relationship (false)

contactPerson.description: Free text entry of a contact person at the client company

financialIntermediary.description: Flag showing whether the client is a financial intermediary (true)

companyId.description: Swiss Business Identification Number, which replaces the old VAT number

entryCodeCommercialRegister.description: Code of the commercial register entry code

commercialRegisterEntryDate.description: Date (yyyy-MM-dd) of the entry in the commercial register

commercialRegisterEntryDeletionDate.description: Deletion date (yyyy-MM-dd) of the entry in the commercial register

zekID.description: ZEK (Central Office for Credit Information) client ID

teledataID.description: Client identification in the case of Teledata

domiciliaryCompany.description: Flag showing whether it is a domiciliary company (company that does not do business in the country of domicile)

numberOfEmployeesAsAt.description: Number of employees as at date

numberOfEmployees.description: Number of employees of the company

noga.description: Economic activity / NOGA code ((Nomenclature Generale des Activites economiques: economic activity) according to version 2008

language.description: ISO_639-1 - Language code of the leading person's mother tongue

frequencyOfContact.description: Code of the client contact frequency

bulkMailing.description: Flag showing whether bulk mailing is permitted or not

openingDate.description: Date of the client relationship opening (yyyy-MM-dd)

advisor.description: Advisors can be provided with their roles when opening clients here. Please note that both fields need to be specified so that the advisor is taken into account accordingly.

v2.client.description: Client data that must be added to Finnova

formOfAddress.description: Form of address code of the individual client

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth (yyyy-MM-dd) of the individual client

nationality.description: ISO_3166-1 - country code of the partner's nationality

nationality2.description: ISO_3166-1 - country code of the second nationality if the partner has dual nationality

title.description: Code of the partner's academic title

maritalStatus.description: Code of the partner's marital status

key.description: Technical sequence number of the entered client

counterpartyCategory.description: Counterparty category code according to CAO

externalNumber.description: External representation of the reserved account number

v2.accountReservationResponse.description: Reserves a new account number in Finnova without opening an account.

externalNumber.description: Internal Finnova representation of the externally recognised account number

portfolioNumber.description: Portfolio (techn. sequence number) allocated to the account. If nothing is delivered, the default portfolio '00' is used.

category.description: Account category for the designation of the account which appears on the statements

currency.description: ISO_4217 - Account currency code (or valuation currency in the case of a custody account)

v2.account.description: Personal data and account data regarding the identified client in the resource.

category.description: Category for the designation of the account if no free text is used

authorisedPerson.description: Technical client sequence number of the authorised person who can have use of the card

v2.Card.description: Adds a new card for a new client.

key.description: Technical card sequence number of the ordered card

number.description: Card number of the ordered card

pepSystem.description: Automatically generated code for politically exposed persons

pepManual.description: Manually generated code for politically exposed persons

furtherRisks.description: Code showing whether there are further risk criteria

riskCategory.description: Risk category code / Result of the money laundering check

decisionAdvisor.description: Advisor's AMLO decision as to whether the relationship is accepted or not

advisor.description: User ID of the employee who made the AMLO decision

v2.amloDecisionResponse.description: Delivers the Anti Money Laundering Office (AMLO) information for a particular client.

checkType.description: Check type code of the client

clientDocumentType.description: Code of the client document type

signatureDate.description: Date (yyyy-MM-dd) of the contract signature according to 'Place and date'

accountAllocated.description: Technical account sequence number which is required if the contract refers to this account

comment.description: Free text entry of comments for this contract

terminationRule.description: Rule code of the contract termination

storageLocation.description: Code of the document storage location

deliveryTypeEbanking.description: Accounts of a contract opened in the future receive electronic documents via internet banking by default, 4 = yes, otherwise no

docKey.description: Technical document number of expected return documents or document numbers released for that

autoActivation.description: Flag whether newly opened accounts should be allocated automatically (true/false)

accountKey.description: Technical account sequence number. For telebanking contractswith this loaded KT_LNR, the competence code applies exactly for this account. This competence overrides a general competence assignment at client level for this account.

authorisationType.description: Authorisation type of allocated accounts which sets the defined control code values accordingly

contractId.description: Bank-internal contract ID of the entered contract

currency.description: ISO_4217 - Currency code for the note amount

contactOf.description: Date and time (yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss) of the note creation

contactType.description: Code of the client contact type

employee.description: User ID of the employee who had contact with the client and who entered this note

initiative.description: Code showing whether contact was made on the advisors initiative (bank) or the client's initiative

comment.description: Comment on this note regarding this contact

v2.note.description: Note data that needs to be entered for the selected client.

noteKey.description: Technical sequence number of the created note

deadline.description: Deadline of pending task (yyyy-MM-dd). May be mandatory, depending on pending task type. Acceted formats are date (yyyy-MM-dd) or date and time (yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss)

completedOn.description: Date and time (yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss) of completion. Only provide if status is 'closed'

display.description: Display code of the client pending task. Depending on the pending taskk type, restriction is possible or not possible.

employee.description: User ID of the employee who is responsible for the pending task

orderKey.description: Technical sequence number of the original order this pending task refers to

comment.description: Comment regarding this client pending task. Depending on the type of pending task, loaded obligatorily or optionally.

currency.description: ISO_4217 - Currency code for the pending task amount

status.description: Code of the Signbase power of attorney status

legitimation.description: Code of the legitimation for the power of attorney

signatureDate.description: Date (yyyy-MM-dd) of the contract signature according to 'Place and date'

accountAllocated.description: Technical account sequence number of the resource client which is required if the power of attorney refers to this account

comment.description: Free text entry of comments for this contract

terminationRule.description: Rule code of the contract termination

signingAuthority.description: Code of the signing authority of the allocated client

until.description: Date until which this relationship existed (Used for EU interest taxation)

codes.description: List of all code tables for the given tenant

CodeTablesResponse.description: Response object for a code tables request

templated.description: if true then use {rel} place holder in href (default is true)

href.description: Link to the code table entry/item

code.description: Identification of the item/code table entry

language.description: Language of the shortcut and the description (ISO-639-1)

shortcut.description: Shortcut of the item/code table entry

description.description: Description of the item/code table entry

Item.description: Code table item, an entry of a code table

name.description: Textual description of the code table

CodeTableResponse.description: Response object for a code table request

clientStatus.description: Client status code. This status helps to distinguish inactive clients from active clients

firstName.description: First name of the leading person

lastName.description: Last name of leading person or company name

place.description: Designation of the place (excl. country and postcode)

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the individual client or foundation date of a legal entity

clientIdentified.description: Code for whether a CDB check has been carried out (true) or not (false)
